nodes.text: The Lake Umberbool Shore Patrol was an agency used by the Gungan's to patrol the area of Lake Umberbool on Naboo. They were known to wear distinctive uniforms and were at times equipped with compact "farseein"s in order to check upon distant targets. Typically, they were deployed during the Big Nasty Free-For-All competition, where they monitored the athletes that took part in it.
In 33 BBY, Captain Roos Tarpals was present with the Shore Patrol and later borrowed a Kaadu from the Commander of the group in order to participate in the Big Nasty Free-For-All.
